name: qop 3
summary:
qop 3 is a minimalistic puzzle which goal is to get the cube to finish using 4 directions in space. The difficulty increases due to the unique cubes - angular and teleports.

- FullHD
- 60 levels (from simple to insufferably difficult)
- Smooth animation
- Pleasant music
- Intuitive interface
- Steam achievements
